column5: Was wondering if anyone had any information or could point me in the right direction on fishing opportunities in the Manitouwadge Ontario? I don't see much written about the area. Thanks in advance-pisces

hey i worked up there for a couple summers, and there was only one outfitter in town who also ran a bati shop. as for resorts, there was one up towards hillsports. we caught fish eveywhere we tried, if you go call ahead to the manitouwadge motore hotel they could give you more information.

Thanks for the info. I will check into the bait shop for further directions. I will be go there soon. Can you remember any of the names of the lakes and river you fished and what species you caught? - pisces
we fished the kagiano,a nd some samller lakes im not too sure of the names
we fished the kagiano,a nd some samller lakes im not too sure of the names
